title: 83/629/EEC: Commission Decision of 2 December 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Perkin Elmer - Infrared Spectrophotometer, model 283' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 2 December 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Perkin Elmer - Infrared Spectrophotometer, model 283' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/629/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Perkin Elmer - Infrared Spectrophotometer, model 283' which is subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 30 May 1983 may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 December 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
